name: Remillard Game WIP
description:
Howdy, J.E.Moores here.

Michael Remillard and I are collaborating on a wacky indie mobile game. This is a free PC version all zipped up for you to download and play. This is a work in progress test game, (ads are not activated yet, so it's totally free to play.)

Download the file: Remillard-PC.zip > right click and unzip it.

Open 2 folders: Remillard-PC > win32exe

Scroll down and double click the file: Remillard.exe

Screen opens a little too square. Adjust screen so it is a long phone shaped rectangle and everything will look OK. 

Controls: Your rocket buggy rolls forward on its own.  You can JUMP (space bar) or you can SHOOT (tap the period button on your keyboard). Shoot alien monsters, and try to collect enough cards to unlock advanced levels with many more creatures to battle.

Everything works except the ads, so the WATCH reward video button will not trigger. Other than that, the game is playable for testing. Feel free to give me any ideas you get and I'll see if I can work them into the final version for iOS and Android.

Art by: Michael Remillard, Music by: Mark Harvey, Game by: J.E.Moores

Stay warm and be cool.

Jay from: JEMoores.com
